articles.title: Macron and Trump have ‘frank conversation’ minutes before European meeting on Ukraine - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: The call came before the French president welcomed a group of European leaders in Paris.
articles.content:
PARIS French President Emmanuel Macron and his American counterpart Donald Trump spoke on the phone minutes before Macron greeted European dignitaries who had gathered to discuss security in Paris.
